item.title: Python
item.description: Python, the Computational Program Python is a computational program that allows users to use a varitey of packages and programs through its interface to conduct prcoedures needed in a variety of fields (i.e., computational biology or statistics in general). In our class for computational biology, we used the program R studio which can be used in conjuction with Python. For instance, down below is a tutorial on how to use Python along with the R Studio interface.
